  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addAskingClient​(String login, ClientContext ctx)
    Add the given client to the "Asking clients list".
    Clients in this list can not receive private message until this client reply with 'yes' or 'no'.
    private void addPrivateClient​(String login, ClientContext ctx)
    Adds client informations to the list of private clients.
    private void answerToPrivateRequest​(String response, String login)
    Performs action according to the given response to the private communication request.
    Removes the given client from the 'asking clients list' if the answer is 'no'.
    Establishes a connection and registers the given client as a private client otherwise.
    private PrivateAnswerFromCliFrame assignAndGetNewPrivateId​(String login)
    Assigns the given login with an unique ID, then return the port of the private server to which the client can connect.
    If the private server does not exist, this method creates it.
    void clearPendingFiles​(String login)
    Remove pending files for 'login'.
    void clearPendingMessages​(String login)
    Remove pending messages for 'login'.
    void connectToPrivateServer​(InetSocketAddress server, String login, int tokenID)
    Connect the client to the server corresponding to another client's private server.
    Then register the server to selector and the server's owner to the private clients list.
    FileOutputStream createNewFile​(String fileName)
    Create a new file with the given name, and return a stream in which it's possible to write content.
    private void createPrivateServer()
    Creates the private server and register it to the selector.
    private void doAccept​(SelectionKey key)
    Accepts the client to the private server, and assign him its clientContext.
    private void doConnect​(SelectionKey key)
    Finishes the process of connection with server if possible.
    Then, if the server corresponds to the public server, sends the connection request with login / password.
    Else (it corresponds to a private server) send the private string message that the client wanted to send.
    private boolean ensurePublicServerValid()
    Checks if the public server is accessible or not, prints a message if it's not and return false.
    private void init()
    Resets client parameters and initiates connection with server.
    private boolean isTokenIdExisting​(int tokenID)
    Determines if the given token ID is already in use.
    void launch()
    Starts the client on a new thread, with reset parameters.
    void log​(Level level, String msg)
    Log a message.
    void log​(Level level, String msg, Throwable thrw)
    Log a message.
    private void run()
    Starts treating keys in the selector while the associated thread is uninterrupted.
    void sendFile​(String fileName, String login)
    Sends a file to the recipient client, by rounds of chunks.
    private void sendFileByRounds​(ClientContext ctx, String fileName, int currentId)
    Starts a new thread which send the content of a file by rounds of chunks, until the whole file is sent.
    void sendPrivateMessage​(String msg, String login)
    Adds a string message to the private client's queue.
    If the login does not correspond to an existing private client, send a request to the server to create a new communication with this potential client.

    Sent messages while the communication has not been established are pending, and sent after the connection is established.
    private void sendPrivateRequest​(String login)
    Sends a frame to the public server in order to request the recipient client 'login' to establish a private communication.
    Creates the messages and files queue to send after and if communication is establish.
    void sendPublicMessage​(String msg)
    Adds a string message to the public server's queue.
    private void silentlyClose​(SelectionKey key)
    Closes the connection with the server.
    If the connection corresponded to a private server, the corresponding client is removed from the clients list.
    void stop()
    Stops the client thread.
    It does not reset client parameters (buffers, queue and frame reader)
    private void treatKey​(SelectionKey key)
    Performs an action according to the available state of the given SelectionKey.
    void tryAuthenticate​(int id, String login, ClientContext ctx)
    Authenticates the given SelectionKey to this server if the given token ID is correct.
    Authentication succeed if the pair (ID, login) exists in the pending client list.
    Removes the id from the "pending" list after authentication.

  • Method Details

    • launch

      public void launch() throws IOException
      Starts the client on a new thread, with reset parameters. Listens to the public server and allow another thread to send frames to it.

      Gives the possibility to also communicate with another server and sending to it private messages and files.

      Finally, this client can also become a server to establish itself a communication with another client.
      Throws:
      IOException - if connection to any server failed or the creation of the server failed.

    • stop

      public void stop()
      Stops the client thread.
      It does not reset client parameters (buffers, queue and frame reader)

    • init

      private void init() throws IOException
      Resets client parameters and initiates connection with server.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • run

      private void run()
      Starts treating keys in the selector while the associated thread is uninterrupted.

    • treatKey

      private void treatKey​(SelectionKey key)
      Performs an action according to the available state of the given SelectionKey.
      Parameters:
      key - The key ready for an I/O action.
      Throws:
      UncheckedIOException - if connection or acceptance caused an IOException.

    • doConnect

      private void doConnect​(SelectionKey key) throws IOException
      Finishes the process of connection with server if possible.
      Then, if the server corresponds to the public server, sends the connection request with login / password.
      Else (it corresponds to a private server) send the private string message that the client wanted to send.
      Parameters:
      key - The key corresponding to the server to which we want to connect.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • doAccept

      private void doAccept​(SelectionKey key) throws IOException
      Accepts the client to the private server, and assign him its clientContext.
      Parameters:
      key - The key associated to the private server
      Throws:
      IOException

    • silentlyClose

      private void silentlyClose​(SelectionKey key)
      Closes the connection with the server.
      If the connection corresponded to a private server, the corresponding client is removed from the clients list.
      It does not throw exception if an I/O error occurs.

    • addPrivateClient

      private void addPrivateClient​(String login, ClientContext ctx)
      Adds client informations to the list of private clients.
      Parameters:
      login - The client login.
      ctx - The Context associated to the client.

    • createPrivateServer

      private void createPrivateServer()
      Creates the private server and register it to the selector.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • isTokenIdExisting

      private boolean isTokenIdExisting​(int tokenID)
      Determines if the given token ID is already in use.
      Parameters:
      tokenID - The token ID
      Returns:
      True if the given token ID is already in use.

    • assignAndGetNewPrivateId

      private PrivateAnswerFromCliFrame assignAndGetNewPrivateId​(String login)
      Assigns the given login with an unique ID, then return the port of the private server to which the client can connect.
      If the private server does not exist, this method creates it.
      Parameters:
      login - The login to assign.
      Returns:
      The frame containing the ID assigned and the port of the private server.

    • ensurePublicServerValid

      private boolean ensurePublicServerValid()
      Checks if the public server is accessible or not, prints a message if it's not and return false.
      Returns:
      true if the public server is accessible, false otherwise.

    • sendPublicMessage

      public void sendPublicMessage​(String msg)
      Adds a string message to the public server's queue.
      Parameters:
      msg - The message to send.

    • sendPrivateRequest

      private void sendPrivateRequest​(String login)
      Sends a frame to the public server in order to request the recipient client 'login' to establish a private communication.
      Creates the messages and files queue to send after and if communication is establish.
      Parameters:
      login - The login of the recipient client.

    • answerToPrivateRequest

      private void answerToPrivateRequest​(String response, String login)
      Performs action according to the given response to the private communication request.
      Removes the given client from the 'asking clients list' if the answer is 'no'.
      Establishes a connection and registers the given client as a private client otherwise.
      Parameters:
      response - The answer to the private communication request.
      login - The login of the recipient client.

    • sendPrivateMessage

      public void sendPrivateMessage​(String msg, String login)
      Adds a string message to the private client's queue.
      If the login does not correspond to an existing private client, send a request to the server to create a new communication with this potential client.

      Sent messages while the communication has not been established are pending, and sent after the connection is established.
      Parameters:
      msg - The message to send.
      login - The login of the recipient client.

    • sendFileByRounds

      private void sendFileByRounds​(ClientContext ctx, String fileName, int currentId)
      Starts a new thread which send the content of a file by rounds of chunks, until the whole file is sent.
      Parameters:
      ctx - The recipient client context.
      fileName - The file path to send.
      currentId - The file ID.

    • sendFile

      public void sendFile​(String fileName, String login)
      Sends a file to the recipient client, by rounds of chunks.
      Parameters:
      fileName - The name of the file in the files directory.
      login - The login of the recipient client.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - It should never happened.

    • tryAuthenticate

      public void tryAuthenticate​(int id, String login, ClientContext ctx)
      Description copied from interface: Client
      Authenticates the given SelectionKey to this server if the given token ID is correct.
      Authentication succeed if the pair (ID, login) exists in the pending client list.
      Removes the id from the "pending" list after authentication.
      Specified by:
      tryAuthenticate in interface Client
      Parameters:
      id - The token ID.
      login - The login.
      ctx - The client Context to authenticate.

      Description copied from interface: Client
      Connect the client to the server corresponding to another client's private server.
      Then register the server to selector and the server's owner to the private clients list.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      server - The server to connect to.
      login - The login of the server owner.
      tokenID - The id assigned to the communication with the server.
